name: Barrage
description: Make a ranged attack on a creature, rolling 1d4 on a hit. You attack with a barrage of ranged strikes equal to the number shown. Each projectile deals 1d4 normal damage.
higherLevels: Each projectile that hits deals 1d6 at level 5, 2d4 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.

effect.name: Effectiveness varies depending on when it is used.
effect.effect: 3 Appeal points if move is not performed first or last, 1 Appeal point if move is performed first or last.
